amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to arm, train, or employ individuals under the age of 18 years for the Facilities Protection Service.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1869 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1869 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR 10/17/2003 S12682) To prohibit the use of funds to arm, train, or employ individuals under the age of 18 years for the Facilities Protection Service.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1869 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1869 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Reid.
